name: Men Of God Christian Fraternity Incorporated
description:
Mission: In compliance with the word of God as stated in Ephesians 6:10-18, Men of God is dedicated to living free through the fellowship of brothers (1 Peter 3:8-9, Acts 2:42-47), education through the word of God (2 Timothy 2:15), and salvation through our Lord and savior Jesus Christ (John 3:16, Romans 10:13)
Purpose: We believe that persons drawn to the organization have been so lead by the Spirit of God having already been equipped with the tools necessary to become a warrior for Christ. Thus our objective is to merely encourage such a transition refining those gifts and talents given by God so that overall the body of Christ may be uplifted.
